biotools.summary: Computer program to reconstruct and evaluate majority rule supertrees: MR(-), MR(+) and MR(+)g. It searches tree space by NNI (nearest-neighbor interchange) and TDR (taxa-deletion-reinsertion). Only fully resolved input and supertrees are considered, multifurcating trees may be returned as the strict consensus of equally best scoring trees.
